backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a horse racing betting system with value bet detection, trust weight tracking per odds range, race history logging, and ROI calculation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting planned enhancements to ModelState interface, storage initialization, and statistics calculation functions for signal weights and calibration parameters.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and type definitions for the betting workflow application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining racing-inspired theme variables for light and dark modes with bold orange/gold accents.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the GTA Horse Betting Assistant application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping BettingWorkflow with ThemeProvider, Layout, and Toaster for notifications.
Main workflow orchestrator managing three-tab navigation (Dashboard, Odds Entry, Prediction+Results) with phase state machine and automatic reset after result logging.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard screen displaying ROIDashboard performance metrics and instructional cards explaining the four-step betting workflow.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Application layout with racing-themed header featuring trophy icon and title, plus footer with caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/OddsEntryForm.ts: Form component for entering horse names and betting odds with validation for minimum 2 horses, positive odds, and unique names. Manages dynamic horse input fields with add/remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/PredictionAndRes: Combined component that displays value bet predictions with bucket-adjusted probabilities and handles race result logging. Integrates historical bucket statistics to adjust implied probabilities and normalizes them for recommendations.
frontend/src/components/PredictionDispla: Displays recommended picks based on odds-anchored probability analysis and identifies value bets. Shows normalized probabilities and highlights the top pick with value bet indicators.
frontend/src/components/ResultLogger.tsx: Component for selecting and logging the winning horse after a race completes. Calculates normalized probabilities and submits race outcomes to update the learning system.
frontend/src/components/ROIDashboard.tsx: Dashboard component showing overall betting performance metrics (ROI, win rate, total races) and odds bucket performance statistics. Subscribes to storage changes for real-time updates.
frontend/src/components/WorkflowIndicato: Visual indicator showing the current phase in the betting workflow (Entry, Predict, Log, Learn) with icons and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication. Handles actor creation with optional identity and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBettingHistory.ts: React hook that loads betting history from AsyncStorage, subscribes to storage changes for real-time updates, and provides loading/error states with a manual refresh function.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching value bets, logging races, retrieving race history, ROI, and trust weights from the backend actor with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRaceStorage.ts: React hook for asynchronously logging race data to storage, automatically rebuilding derived statistics and notifying listeners of changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useStorageRebuild.ts: React hook that provides manual rebuilding of derived statistics from race records with loading/error/success states.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors including sidebar, charts, and UI component tokens.
frontend/src/lib/immutable.ts: Utility functions for deep freezing objects to enforce runtime immutability, checking freeze status, and creating immutable copies via JSON serialization.
frontend/src/lib/statsCalculator.ts: Pure functions for calculating betting statistics and odds bucket metrics (1-2, 3-5, 6-10, 11-30 ranges) including ROI, win rates, variance, and recent performance from race records.
frontend/src/lib/storage.ts: AsyncStorage wrapper for localStorage providing typed read/write operations, immutable race record creation, and automatic calculation of derived statistics with error handling for quota and corruption.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for conditional CSS class name merging.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider for React Query and ICP authentication.
frontend/src/types/storage.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for AsyncStorage data structures including race records, model state with signal weights, betting history, and odds bucket statistics for persistent race tracking and machine learning.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended typography, container queries, animations, and custom font families (Inter and JetBrains Mono).
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a GTA Online horse betting assistant with odds-anchored predictions, incremental learning system, and a three-screen workflow loop (Dashboard → Odds Entry → Prediction/Results) that resets after each race.
